steps: Step 1: Review major AI research publications and whitepapers from leading organizations (OpenAI, DeepMind, Meta, Google) released in late 2024 and early 2025 to identify emerging technical trends
Step 2: Analyze industry reports from Gartner, McKinsey, and Forrester on AI adoption forecasts and market predictions for 2025
Step 3: Examine recent announcements and product launches from major tech companies to identify practical AI applications and deployment trends
Step 4: Survey academic conferences and preprint repositories (arXiv) for cutting-edge AI research topics gaining momentum in 2025
Step 5: Compile data on enterprise AI investment patterns, funding trends, and venture capital focus areas for 2025
Step 6: Synthesize findings into a comprehensive summary identifying top 5-7 AI trends with supporting evidence and projected impact for 2025
